import {useState} from 'react'; import './novo.css' import Header from '../../components/Header'; import Title from '../../components/Title'; import {FiPlusCircle} from 'react-icons/fi' export default function New() { const [servico, setServico] = useState('Avaliacao') const [status,setStatus] = useState('Aberto') function cadastrarChamadoFirebase( e ) { e.preventDefault() alert("Clicou") } // Chamando quando troca servico function trocaOpcaoSelect(e){ setServico( e.target.value ) } // Chama quando troca status function trocaOpcaoRadio( e ) { } return (
<FiPlusCircle size={25}/>
